nodes.text: Koratas was the fourth moon of Dathomir. It had red soil that hid several deposits of neutronium, lommite and zersium. The Galactic Empire mined the minerals for use in making durasteel.

Three moons of Dathomir appeared in Jump to Lightspeed, the 2004 expansion pack for the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. One of these moons may have been Koratas, however as Dathomir had a total of four moons, it is possible that Koratas may have been the one moon not pictured in the game.
